item.description:
What: BONUS Golf Round @ Discount

When: Tuesday, June 29, 2010 @ 6:00 PM promptly (weather permitting)

Cost: $5 per person - great price, can't beat it!

Where:

Rockland Golf Course
276 Plain Street
Rockland, MA 02370
781-878-5836

Hi guys -

What a great meetup this has been. I'm so excited that everyone is getting so much out of it and enjoying themselves! Good night tonight - huh!

The good news is that they're offering a BONUS week. After we complete our final #4 lesson they're also offering us to play at a discount to put what we've learned into action out on the course for $5 bucks - unbelievable deal!!!

Note:

  • 1/2 hour earlier than lesson or 6 pm
  • you can use clubs provided by golf course



RSVP and let me know who's in!

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

Weather Alternative:

Please check your email that afternoon for cancellation notification - otherwise we will be playing

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Golf - Clinic Group Round of Play
